title: 6 coolest Netflix movie and show announcements from the big Tudum event
description: From young love to spectacular sci-fi, high-octane heists and gripping wartime drama, Tudum 2023 had it all

title: Stranger Things 5 has added a major Terminator actor to its starry cast
description: One of the Terminator franchise's biggest stars has signed on to appear in Stranger Things' final season.

title: Netflix teases first-looks at its live-action takes on two hugely popular anime
description: Netflix debuted the first teasers for its live-action spins on One Piece and Avatar: The Last Airbender at Tudum 2023.

title: Squid Game: The Challenge will fill that Squid-shaped hole until Squid Game 2 is here
description: Netflix teased Squid Game 2 at Tudum 2023, but the real reality show spin-off is likely to be the one that streams first

title: Asus’s incredibly tough TUF external SSD is one of the best rugged drives I’ve seen this year - and it costs less than you think
description: The AS1000 is aimed at gamers but anyone from creatives to field workers can benefit from its features.

title: Geralt fights fire and elves in bloody and brutal first clip for The Witcher season 3
description: The first extended clip for The Witcher season 3 was shown during Netflix's Tudum 2023 fan event.

title: Game of Thrones showrunners trade bloody fantasy for mind-bending sci-fi with new Netflix show
description: David Benioff and D.B. Weiss' first Netflix project, titled 3 Body Problem, is a marked departure from their previous TV show.

title: Valheim finally introduces new difficulty options
description: Valheim now has difficulty options, enabling you to increase or decrease the challenge.

title: Sony is "happy" with its strategy not to release its first-party games on PS Plus
description: Sony seemingly has no plans to rework its subscription service to match that of competitor Microsoft.

title: Microsoft just made its Bing AI chatbot much better for iPhone owners
description: Microsoft is bringing iOS users a cool feature that Android fans have had for some time.

title: iPhone 15 release date predictions: when will Apple’s next iPhones arrive?
description: Here’s when we expect Apple’s iPhone 15 line to be released in 2023.

title: Fresh Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 leak reveals the smartwatch designs in full
description: Take a peek at the new smartwatches on the way from Samsung, and some of the color options.

title: You could be making some serious errors with your passwords - this is why
description: Do your passwords fit these tough security rules?

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, June 17 (game #509)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
